channel.title: Trophy Gold: Nirvana on Fire
channel.description:
![dead_space_conceptart_OeSFr|690x386](upload://gGBII3tu9cXiUr9lBFxShJRLeCE.jpeg) ## The power station on the moon Bodhisattva 2a is nearing the end of its lifecycle and without it, the small Zen colony established there will freeze to death. *Abbot Benz-Shiroyuki* requests aid. He is willing to give over salvage rights to the decommissioned and heavily damaged terraforming tower at the top of the space elevator to any willing to print a working power converter in the *manufactory* and deliver it to the colony.
We'll be using *Trophy Gold* to play through a module originally designed for *Mothership.* I've done a quick bash of *TG* and *Mothership* character creation, so the characters will feel like *Mothership* characters, but we'll run them without problem in *TG's* mechanics. A seat is being held for Fraser Simons.
> **Content warnings:** Violence, body transformation, brainwashing and assimilation, all in the context of trans-humanism > **System:** [*Trophy Gold*](https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/293716&affiliate_id=1113880) and [*Nirvana on Fire*](https://magnum-galaxy-games.itch.io/nirvana-on-fire?ac=puy37ueEch) > **Duration:** Four, three hour sessions > **Breaks:** Two hourly breaks per session (~10 minutes each) > **Venue:** [Zoom](https://www.zoom.com/) > **Recording:** Yes, with the consent of all players each session > **Attendance:** Joining all sessions is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. > **Safety:** [Lines & Veils](https://rpg.stackexchange.com/questions/30906/what-do-the-terms-lines-and-veils-mean) and [X-card](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1SB0jsx34bWHZWbnNIVVuMjhDkrdFGo1_hSC2BWPlI3A/edit?usp=sharing). This series adheres to the [Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html) and has an open door policy.
